mapper.select: select * from `team_teacher` LEFT JOIN ( select team.id as team_id,cp_id,team_name,cp_name,leader_id, name as leaderName ,member,team_intro from team LEFT JOIN user on user.id=leader_id LEFT JOIN competition on cp_id=competition.id ) as teamDto on `team_teacher`.team_id=teamDto.team_id where teacher_id=#{id} and flag = 0

select * from `team_teacher` LEFT JOIN ( select team.id as t_id,cp_id,team_name,cp_name,leader_id, name as leaderName ,member,team_intro from team LEFT JOIN user on user.id=leader_id LEFT JOIN competition on cp_id=competition.id ) as teamDto on `team_teacher`.team_id=teamDto.t_id where teacher_id=#{id} and select_type=1;
select s.*, u.name as teacherName from `team_teacher` s left join user u on u.id = s.teacher_id where team_id = #{teamId} and select_type = 1
